title: Indiscretions of the Queen
description: It was necessary for the Prince of Wales to marry and the choice fell on Caroline of Brunswick. Caroline wanted to marry a Major in her father's army and her unpredictable behaviour had already resulted in scandals about her private life. Arriving in England she found her bridegroom's mistress waiting to undermine her position and to spy on her, the Prince determined to hate her, and her new family, with the exception of the half-crazy King, hostile to her.
author: Jean Plaidy
